author: timbeiko
content:
**ACDE TL;DW** 
- EL testing team gave an overview of the `execution-spec-tests` repo. Presentation here: https://notes.ethereum.org/@danceratopz/execution-spec-tests-overview-202306 
- Dencun updates: moved the 4844 precompile address to `0xA` to pack them tightly (and will move BLS to another address), proposal to bound the 4788 storage size (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7178), Engine API spec release (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/420) and Dencun CL spec should be out in the next few days!
- Devnet updates: we had some issues on devnet-6, and will restart another devnet with the same specs once clients pass hive tests & have stable releases. 
- ERCs / EIPs repo split: client teams agreed we should split the repos, with some objections some EIP editors. We'll discuss how to move this forward in next week's EIPIP call: https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/245
